description: The BGP Established event is generated when
the BGP FSM enters the ESTABLISHED state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2Established BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddrType i 1 BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddr s '192.0.2.1' BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType i 1 BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddr s '192.0.2.2' BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived s EX BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerState.42 i 6

description: The address family of the local end of the peering
session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddrType

description: The address of the local end of the peering session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddr

description: The address family of the remote end of the peering
session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType

description: The address of the remote end of the peering session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode received by this BGP
Speaker via a NOTIFICATION message for this peer.
If no error has occurred, this field is zero.
Otherwise, the first byte of this two byte
OCTET STRING contains the error code, and the second
byte contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived

description: The remote BGP peer's FSM state.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerState

description: The BGPBackwardTransition Event is generated
when the BGP FSM moves from a higher numbered
state to a lower numbered state.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2BackwardTransition BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddrType i 1 BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddr s '192.0.2.1' BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType i 1 BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddr s '192.0.2.2' BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived s EX BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceivedText s EXAMPLE BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerState.42 i 5

description: The address family of the local end of the peering
session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddrType

description: The address of the local end of the peering session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLocalAddr

description: The address family of the remote end of the peering
session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddrType

description: The address of the remote end of the peering session.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerRemoteAddr

description: The last error code and subcode received by this BGP
Speaker via a NOTIFICATION message for this peer.
If no error has occurred, this field is zero.
Otherwise, the first byte of this two byte
OCTET STRING contains the error code, and the second
byte contains the subcode.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceived

description: This object contains an implementation specific
explanation of the error that was reported.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerLastErrorReceivedText

description: The remote BGP peer's FSM state.
variables.name: BGP4-V2-MIB-JUNIPER::jnxBgpM2PeerState
